result.title: Identification/selection of E-CAM meso and multi-scale modelling codes for development
result.description: Special report on the state of the art methods and algorithms, including: use of neural networks for force calculation and structure recognition; kinetic Monte Carlo calculations and the interface with computational fluid dynamics and electronic structure calculations; charge and polarization in dissipative dynamics calculations; statistical mechanics of Hamiltonian adaptive resolution simulations; hybrid kinetic schemes for modeling complex fluidsIt will also contain a review of software in this area and a list of new modules to be developed by E-CAM.
